unnormalised: Hey! Interested in trying Ayurveda. Heard good things about Kerala Ayurvedic treatments. Anyone tried Dr. Vaidya's clinic? Maybe in Pune? Was thinking of a Panchakarma retreat. Heard Oct 26th is good. My cousin, Priya, went last year, 17/03/2023. Recommended it highly! Said it helped with her stress. Planning a visit sometime around 11:00 hrs. Costed her Rs. 15,000.
normalised: Hey! Interested in trying Ayurveda. Heard good things about Kerala Ayurvedic treatments. Anyone tried Doctor Vaidya's clinic? Maybe in Pune? Was thinking of a Panchakarma retreat. Planning a visit sometime around eleven zero zero hours. Costed her rupee fifteen thousand.
